title: Okami Wa Nemuranai - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Aristocracy   Beasts   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Dungeons   Gods   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Herbalist   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Master-Disciple Relationship   Medical Knowledge   Merchants   Monsters   Nobles   Orphans   Pharmacist   Pragmatic Protagonist   Priestesses   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong to Stronger   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World
author: ShienBIS   支援BIS
description: One-eyed Wolf Lecan is a skilled adventurer who has conquered many dungeons all over the world. He had been going solo for a long time, but in the last three years, he’s had a partner. That partner jumps into the black hole together with Lecan, and both go their separate ways as they fall into another world. Dungeons and magical beasts also exist in that world. After learning the native language, Lecan goes on a journey. Meeting a good teacher, Lecan studies medicine making and magic under that teacher, and begins his dungeon explorations for real.>
